medical_history.chief_complaint: The proband presented with multiple flat warts scattered on her whole body, notably on the hands and legs.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms were noted since age 17. Histopathology confirmed epidermodysplasia verruciformis (EV) and the presence of HPV types 5 and 8.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The younger sibling was diagnosed with Hodgkin lymphoma and also had skin lesions consistent with EV and high EBV load in plasma.
medical_history.family_history: Both patients are siblings born to first-cousin parents, with a documented history of Hodgkin lymphoma and EV in the family.
